name: Who Can See
author: El Houssain Inani

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to create custom page/post the way that will be showed to specified roles for instance :
[whocansee only=’visitor|administrator’]something to be showed to visitors/administrators alone [/whocansee]
OR you can use the except to exclude who cant see the content.

roles :

  • visitor
  • subscriber
  • contributor
  • author
  • editor
  • administrator
sections.installation:
1. Upload \”who-can-see\” folder to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.

short_description: Manipulate part of page/post to be showed/hidden for some roles
